changelog:
- Now allow drag and drop folder/archive/files onto manager to prepare for custom mods install (they get installed after main modpack mods)
- Added Light/Dark mode in settings.
- Now will automatically update manager and keep it up-to-date.
- Fixed checkboxes invisible problem.
- Fixed remove and backup Mods folder not overwriting default settings.
- Fixed branch dropdown does not trigger auto guides.
- Bug fixes.

modpacks.name: Dimserenes-Modpack
modpacks.description:
A full-featured modpack including as many mods as possible.
Talisman branch is available for Talisman mod and mods that depend on it.

modpacks.name: Fine-tuned-Pack
modpacks.description: A carefully crafted modpack for an optimized gameplay experience.

modpacks.name: Vanilla-Plus-Pack
modpacks.description: Enhances the core game with small improvements while staying true to the original experience.

modpacks.name: Cruel-Pack
modpacks.description: A harsh and unforgiving modpack for experienced players.

modpacks.name: Experimental-Pack
modpacks.description: Contains relatively new and experimental mods, for fresh new features and concepts.

hints: ðŸ’¡Tip: Switch between Light and Dark mode in Settings.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Lovely Injector is required for modded gameplay!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Right-click a mod to open its Discord or GitHub page.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Click 'I Feel Lucky' to randomly select mods!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Backup your Mods folder before installing a new modpack.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Drag and drop custom mods into the Mod Manager!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Hover over mods to see their descriptions.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Join the Discord for help and updates!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Click 'Check Versions' to see if your modpack is outdated!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Modpacks update automatically every day at 00:00 UTC.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Don't like the rainbow title? Disable it in Settings!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Uninstalling a modpack wipes the Mods folder. Be careful!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Set a custom game executable in Settings.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Click 'Refresh' if modpack info looks outdated.
ðŸ’¡Tip: 'Steamodded' is always installed and kept up to date.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Mod dependencies are handled automatically!
ðŸ’¡Tip: 'Quick Update' may not always work correctly.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Edit 'user_settings.json' for advanced customization.
ðŸ’¡Tip: The Mod Manager installs required dependencies for certain mods.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Save and load mod selection presets in the install screen.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Drag and drop .zip, .rar, or .7z mod files to auto-extract them!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Mods with dependencies auto-select required mods.
ðŸ’¡Tip: The Manager checks for updates every time you launch it!
ðŸ’¡Tip: Game issues? Try updating Lovely Injector.
ðŸ’¡Tip: Looking for a mod? Use the search bar in mod selection!
ðŸ’¡Tip: 'Steamodded' is required for mods in my modpacks.
